================EditingStyle

### **Government Tender Announcement**

#### **Title**

*   **Car Wash and Vacuum Systems**: [Systèmes de lavage de voiture et d'aspiration](#car-wash-and-vacuum-systems-systèmes-de-lavage-de-voiture-et-d-aspiration)

#### **Tender Details**

| **Reference number** | **WS4506079549-Doc4619750908** |
| --- | --- |
| **Solicitation Number** | WS4506079549 |
| **Publication Date** | 2024-06-05 |
| **Tender Closing Date** | 2024-06-20T14:00:00 |
| **Expected Contract Start Date** | 2024-11-01 |

#### **Procurement Details**

*   **Tender Status**: Open
*   **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
*   **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price
*   **Trade Agreements**:*
    *   Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
    *   Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
    *   Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
    *   Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
    *   Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
    *   Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
    *   Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)

#### **Regions of Deliver and Work**

*   **Regions of Delivery**: Ontario (except NCR)
*   **End User Entities**: Department of National Defence (DND)
*   **Regions of Opportunity**: None
*   **Contracting Entity Name**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

#### **Tender Description**

All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by 14:00 EDT on June 20, 2024. All bids submitted after this time will be considered non-responsive.

#### **Attachment and Useful Information**

For further information on the government tender announcement, please visit [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19913643?extsite=MTk5MTM2NDNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19913643?extsite=MTk5MTM2NDNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)
